Sagar.posted this * 2w

#Day3 of Linked hashtag#project , Today I started building the hashtag#Backend server using hashtag#NodeJS and using hashtag#MongoDB as the database , Created the User , Post model and controllers for each model and custom routes /auth for login and register and /posts to create , update , get , delete post Implemented hashtag#Authentication Login/Register routes where the user get jwt token on successfull login and hashtag#middleware to check the user Login status by checking the jwt token in the headers of request , hashtag#NextChallenge : Integrating Backend with the client side and implementing crud operations for the Post, creating Home page for not authorized users !
